name: Kitchen Escape (TheSecondLeft)
description:
Small roguelike in food setting

You're a burger who try to esacpe the kitchen, meanwhile the other food try to stop you. Collect burger ingredients to improve your stats, or buy them with salt you also collected. Pick the sauce bottles up to get more HP. Collect pepper to spend it in outer shop, to become more powerful at start to get even more pepper and score

3 types of floors, with 6 types of rooms in each (including secret rooms). 3 types of enemies in 6 modifications each. 3 types of helath and 6 types of bonuses. And Mr. Random won't make you bored

Plans to add more types of rooms/enemies/healthbars (it'll be something like items in Isaac)

The game was made as part of student practice in college, so it had some requirements, such as scoreboard, or 4-directional shooting, while it's "The Binding of Isaac clone". However it's grown into something more. So that, I'm here with my first game
